usp.title: How I help your organization move forward

items.title: From idea to scalable digital platform
items.description: I help organizations turn complex challenges into scalable, future-proof platforms. From wireframe to frontend, backend, and database – I deliver complete, working solutions.

items.title: AI implementation & digital transformation
items.description: I use AI where it adds real value. I integrate machine learning and data analysis into new or existing systems to automate processes, generate insights, and serve customers smarter.

items.title: Design Systems & frontend excellence
items.description: I build scalable design systems that accelerate teams. With a focus on performance, accessibility (WCAG), reusability, and consistent branding across all channels.

items.title: API integrations & low-code component architecture
items.description: I create seamless connections between frontend and backend – REST, GraphQL, CQRS. With a configuration-driven frontend, editors can manage content without touching code.

items.title: Mentoring & structure in your development team
items.description: I help your team grow: coaching, quality assurance, refactoring legacy code, and setting technical standards. This builds sustainable teams and stable software.

items.title: Rapid scaling within your project or department
items.description: Whether it’s an MVP, redesign or replatforming: I quickly integrate into existing teams or deliver results independently. Focused on impact within sprints, aligned with your deadlines.
